pages.text:
Party With Blue Martini What We Do Happy Hour Live Entertainment Food & Drink Venue / Private Events Why Blue Martini? Live Entertainment From local talents to renowned artists, our carefully curated lineup ensures that every visit to Blue Martini is a musical journey. Exceptional Service Our attentive and friendly staff is dedicated to ensuring your comfort and satisfaction throughout your Blue Martini experience. Lively Atmosphere The vibrant ambiance, pulsating beats, and the buzz of satisfied customers create an electrifying atmosphere, ensuring that your night is filled with energy and joy. Premium Martinis The vibrant ambiance, pulsating beats, and the buzz of satisfied customers create an electrifying atmosphere, ensuring that your night is filled with energy and joy. About Us Founded with a passion for elevating nightlife, Blue Martini emerged as a vision to redefine the traditional bar experience. With a commitment to creating a haven where moments turn into memories, we have set out to craft a space where every visit is a unique celebration. More About Us
  • Atlanta, GA
    • Brickell - Miami, FL Naples, FL Lake Charles, LA Fort Lauderdale, FL Phoenix, AZ Pointe Orlando, FL Las Vegas, NV Locations From the cosmopolitan vibes of Brickell in Miami to the coastal charm of Naples, and the iconic allure of Las Vegas, Blue Martini invites you to experience an extraordinary night out in a variety of distinctive martini bars. Join us at any of our premier destinations and become part of a community where every night is an event and every location is a unique celebration. Reviews My company hosted a team happy hour here with the help of their Events Manager Cherish. It was a great experience from beginning to end!I have not been here in a few years and was very impressed with the upgrades made. The drinks and food were great and my team enjoyed the experience and attention to details.If you are in a need of a space for a company event, Cherish will make sure it is a flawless experience. - Janelle S. (MIA) This is a great event venue! Cherish, the events manager, was amazing. She helped plan and host my business launch party. Planning the event was so easy and fun and the event went better than I could’ve hoped. Highly recommend booking your events here! - Salma M. (MIA) My friends and I visited Blue Martini two weekends ago during my bachelorette weekend. The staff were so friendly and accommodating, we ended up staying the whole night. The environment and music were great too! Will definitely be coming back here anytime I’m in Miami. Thank you for the amazing hospitality - A soon to be bride and her Texas girls - Maria V. (MIA) We randomly stumbled in here and had a great time. We had a party of 15 and were able to get drinks immediately. We didn’t think we would stay so we didn’t do bottle service, then we ended up staying 3 hours and did it anyway. The DJ was killing it! He played every genre and a little something for everyone. - Angeli P. (MIA) Blue Martini Brickell was recently remodeled and just reopened not too long ago. This classy venue is on track to become a top night life destination in Miami with it's impressive world-class sound system and service for the elite and chic crowd. - 305 Luigi (MIA) Previous Next /content-wrapper Party With Blue Martini What We Do Happy Hour Live Entertainment Food & Drink Venue / Private Events Why Blue Martini?
